reviewText: Great lesson--too pricey!!! Expected the Volume to have at least 3 or 4 episodes!!!  Only 1!  Too expensive for just 23 minutes!!!

We really enjoyed using this series as part of our homeschool history study, but they are so expensive.  I would have liked to buy the set for my younger kids to enjoy when they're ready but we just had to watch it using streaming services.
Was too expensive for such a short movie. My four year old enjoyed it though.
characters, video and concept are good but the story writing is weak.  Not as engaging as I had hoped.
I thought this woudl be a good way to begin to introduce more bible stories to my 3, almost 6 yo. but it is to complicated for them.

My children watch this series at church and have begged me to get it. I enjoy them learning sound, moral principals while being entertained. There are so many inappropriate things for children's viewing these days I appreciate a safe alternative!
